title: Bajaj DX 7 L/W Iron
review:
very good iron good quality in affordable price.it work so good during press in my view Bajaj DX 7 L/W Iron is best. so i suggest to  all buyer if he needed to iron he always buy this type iron .
thanks 
flipcart

title: very very light
review:
Super light....

This product was only the second fastest delivery made to 

The iron is very very very light in weight !!
Wire is about 1.5 meters long (only this is not mentioned in product description although it a very important factor) !!

The temperature control works perfectly
although i have used it only for 1 day right now, lets see if anything happens in 30 days !!!

Another thing is that the wire plug ending is (as obvious but for your information) it is 3 pin !!

3 pin plug !!

title: Good Iron, worth buy
review:
I first ordered a Philips GC83 Iron which is a highly deffective iron, I ordered replcements THREE TIMES each times the iron being faulty and flipkart was kind enough to replace them without any questions.

Being fed-up with Philips GC83 Iron I ordered this iron as a replacement the forth time, Without any problems flipkart was kind enough to provide a replacement with another brand and I got this iron in some days.

This iron is really good product and it heats up fast and the temperature control dial also works smooth.
I am using it for over 9 Months without any issues.
It has two Light indicators.
Red one stays constantly on denoting that iron is connected with power.
Green one goes on / off according to heating. 

The non-stick base is also intact and has not worn off.

So people, If you wanna buy it , trust me with this product and buy it from flipkart, as the market price for this iron is Approx. Rs 800/-.

title: Slightly disappointed
review: Worked for 6 months and now not heats up

title: A Reliable, Durable Iron
review: I must say, bajaj is a good old friend. I purchased this as birthday gift for my mother, and she seemed very happy. She liked the light weight and quickly heating of the iron as sometimes it becomes crucial to wait for the iron to get hot. Also, this is very balanced, and it can be placed easily while ironing. So, i'll give it 4.5/5. The only problem for me was that it's cord length wasn't lengthy enough for our home. May vary for different homes(although it's standard length).

title: Nice and wonderful dry iron
review: I had purchased it on July. Working fine and it is great to iron at home. Again I ordered another for my cousin who likes it after seeing me iron the clothes with this master peice from Bajaj. It is easy to control temperature for different types of fabric with this product while ironing.

title: pro & cons

not stamped on warranty card by flipkart

title: CHEAP AND BEST BUT VERY LIGHT
review: i bought this 6 months before and still it is running perfectly without any problem but the only disadvantage is that it very light weight. while ironing in hurry its bit difficult, if not it works awesomely.good looking, branded product at a cheap rate. i bought this for RS:605 at that time i felt that it is cheap and best and now its less that than. . . . MY RECOMMENDATION IS IT IS VERY USEFUL FOR BACHELORS. ON THE WHOLE AWESOME PRODUCT. . . .

title: Great service n great product
review: Flipkart service was gr8...ordered it on 22nd sep n got it delivered today, i.e on 24th sep...really very quick service...the packing was also gr8...n d iron is pretty good...heats up pretty fast!!! Thnx guyz!!!

title: Terrible product

title: Excellent Product
review: Excellent Product and superb fast delivery. Uniform heat distribution, Style & Design and the Heating Quality are beautiful and satisfactory. Voted up & suggested. Go for it a nice product from Bajaj with in budget. Thanks to flipkart.

title: Iron for Bachelors :)
review:
If you are a bachelor and you not only want to save few bucks but more importantly you want your clothes to be be Ironed by yourself only, then you must go for it.

Ease - 9/10
Getting heated up when on - Instant (2 mins)
Cord Length - Sufficient

Plastic body not only looks nice, it also make sure novice people don't get burned up. The build is quite nice and yes its worth the price.

And once gain thanks to Flipkart for speedy delivery.

title: Good but not the best
review: I got this product for Rs500 and have been using since a weak.Good product at this price range. Having non-stick sole plate helps to iron without sticking. But power is a bit less though. Finally i can say if you want a simple product then go for it. Otherwise steam irons will be better in both performance and durability.

title: Bajaj DX 7 a wonderful iron!
review:
Very light and ergonomically comfortable iron. Allows you to easily iron out wrinkles from your clothes. 

Another wonderful fact is this iron is a product of India. Based on the experience with the iron, I can proudly say "Be Indian Buy Indian!!:

A definite recommendation for anyone looking out to buy an iron for home use. 

Thanks to flipkart for amazing delivery!!!!!

title: FlipKart Rocks..!!
review:

2. Heats up fast.
3. Good cord length.
4. Accurate Heat control.

title: Awesome, no regrets, no complaints
review:
Ordered this super iron in May and I am writing this review after 4 months. Gotta tell u, it works superbly and ideal for ur regular ironing (until inless u r not thinking of starting ironing as ur full time profession. :P)..
Pros: Light weight
Enough long wire
comes with a reliable brand of bajaj
Have wonderful heating controls.

Cons: Counldn't find any :)

I had ordered two of them and both are working efficiently. I'll recommend this to all :)

title: I can say it's not bad
review: I am not a frequent user of Iron. Generally I get my clothes ironed from press wallas. But this Iron comes handy when they are not available. I can easily Iron my cotton T-shirts, which are not recommended to be ironed by heavy press. Besides that, it is good for light clothes. Will not recommend it for clothes that requires heavy pres.

title: ¡qué barbaridad!
review:
Ordered it for my aunt who wanted a new iron.
Received a short circuited defective product

Blows the fuse as soon as I plug it in. Have requested a refund/replacement.

I hoped with all these positive reviews there would be some quality control with the manufacturer but I am disappointed.
Would have rated 0 if there was one on the scale. 

Our old local make iron still works fine.

title: GOOD IRON BOX
review:
First of all, Superb and fast service by Flipkart as always.. Thanks Guys !

Pro: As mention in the title, this is a value for money Iron Box, its very light.. and the cord length is also good enough !

Con : The plastic exterior build quality and finishing is average, so if you are buying for heavy use or for a large family, the life of the product will depend on how well it will be handled.

GO for it, if you want a value for money Iron, but don't expect a 20 years life expectancy out of it

title: Bad quality
review: Good

title: GRAB IT GUYS !!!
review:
I have recently purcased this product and extremely satisfied with it. The colour and design of the iron makes it look very stylish and its light weight makes it very comfortable to iron.  The wire/cord is longer compared to the the ersion of the same older version of the same product.
    Flipkart.com is selling it at a very low price and the packaging and delivery is excellent. So people looking for an iron from a reputed and reliable company like Bajaj, JUST GRAB IT !!

title: About the product
review:
- Nice, sleek and beautiful. Good to hold.

- Glides easily over most surfaces.

- Warms up quickly.

- The cord is of respectable length. (One less star)

- Eye catching looks.

- Buy it, if you don't care about steam and other bells and whistles. Just sprinkle water on the fabric.

title: Good iron @ low price
review:
Great service by Flipkart as usual. Ordered 10th Sept, got it on 11th. Good bubble wrap and all.

The iron itself is very light. 850gms to be precise. 
The swiveling is only in one plane, id expected it to be in all planes.
Gets hot fast np. Easy to use.

title: Good One for Bachelors.
review: This product is really good in given range, whatever features, specifications given/mentioned all are in this product. we can adjust the mode according to our need. Light weight easy to carry & easy to use. I got this in good packaging also so need not worry about any kind of damage. Thanks Flipkart

title: One of the worst products from Bajaj
review:
While this is a light weight iron, my unit lasted for only few wks.

Thankfully I was on the last day of return

Liked quick support of Flipkart to get the issue resolved

title: Light weight and Easy
review:
Very very light and allows you to easily wipe through the cloths. Have an adjustment at the wire end connected to the box so you can turn the box like anything without twisting your wires around.

Thanks to flip kart for amazing delivery!!!!!

title: Not Good for Cotton Clothes..!!!
review:
The iron is very light & the best part is the non-sticky feature.
But if you are the one who wants to iron cotton clothes, then I won't recommend this iron.
For all other type of clothes, it works fine.

title: Nice and wonderful dry iron
review: I must say, bajaj is a good old friend. I purchased this as birthday gift for my mother, and she seemed very happy. She liked the light weight and quickly heating of the iron as sometimes it becomes crucial to wait for the iron to get hot. Also, this is very balanced, and it can be placed easily while ironing. So, i'll give it 4.5/5. The only problem for me was that it's cord length wasn't lengthy enough for our home. May vary for different homes(although it's standard length).

title: Bajaj Majesty Iron Box
review: Iron Box is very good working, but the box weight is low.  so some of the jeans & other cloths are difficult to iron.

title: Good one...
review:
The first impression.
When the product delivered to me, I opened the pack a beautiful machine came out. A nice white body with a golden colour plate. Every thing is good and perfectly designed.  Well, these were about the product design. In this price tag( flipkart's offering) is a good buy.
Now about the performance,
1- When I plugged in the wire in to the electronic socket,  in no time it got heated.
2- Ironing a fabric is a superb experience in itself. I loved that part as well.
3- It also gets cool quickly. 
I've given 5 stars for Product but that should've been 4 stars. 
This deduction could've been for flipkart's packing. You guys are delivering an electronic product and in packaging you should have wrapped the product with in a bubble roll. That aspect really disappointed me.
Otherwise everything is good. I hope this review will help you making your decision.

title: Average Product but really quick delivery from Flipkart
review: I ordered the product late night and got the delivery within 2 days. I wasn't rally expecting such a quick delivery of the product. The product is that good as I expected it to be. It takes time to get hot and does not remove wrinkles. The only best thing is its lightweightness. I would not recommend this for those who are looking to get rid of wrinkles quickly.

title: Heats too much
review:
The iron heats so much that I'm afraid it'll damage my clothes. So, even when I have to iron cotton clothes, I set the indicator to Silk!
It also takes a long time to cool down once you switch it off.
